hero.description: I craft digital experiences that push boundaries. Full-stack developer specializing in React, Node.js, and creative web technologies.

about.title: About Me
about.p1: I'm a passionate full-stack developer with over 5 years of experience creating innovative digital solutions. My journey began with a curiosity for how things work on the web, and has evolved into a deep expertise in modern web technologies.
about.p2: I believe in the power of clean code, intuitive design, and seamless user experiences. Every project is an opportunity to push boundaries and create something truly exceptional.
about.name: Farid Hashemian

skills.title: Expertise
skills.description: A comprehensive toolkit refined over years of building digital products

projects.title: Portfolio
projects.description: A selection of projects that showcase my expertise and passion for creating impactful digital experiences

sajed.title: sajed Dashboard
sajed.desc: A next-generation fintech dashboard with real-time analytics, AI-powered insights, and seamless transaction management.

mazraee.title: mazraee app
mazraee.desc: An e-commerce platform connecting artisans with customers worldwide. Features include 3D product previews and AR try-on.

synapse.title: Synapse AI
synapse.desc: An AI-powered productivity tool that learns your workflow and automates repetitive tasks intelligently.

ecotrack.title: EcoTrack
ecotrack.desc: Sustainability tracking app helping businesses monitor and reduce their carbon footprint with actionable insights.

senior.title: Senior Frontend Developer
senior.desc: Leading the frontend architecture for enterprise SaaS products. Implemented design systems and mentored junior developers.

fullstack.title: Full-Stack Developer
fullstack.desc: Built scalable web applications from concept to deployment. Collaborated directly with stakeholders to deliver MVPs.

frontend.title: Frontend Developer
frontend.desc: Created responsive websites and interactive experiences for diverse clients across industries.

education.title: B.S. Computer Science
education.desc: Graduated with honors. Focus on web technologies and human-computer interaction.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Have a project in mind? I'd love to hear about it. Let's create something amazing together.
contact.name: Name
contact.successDesc: Thanks for reaching out. I'll get back to you soon.
